name: Seatus, Etherym of Return
text:
2 Level 3 "Etherym" monsters
You can target 1 of your banished "Etherym" monsters, attach it to this card as Xyz Material. You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; return 1 card your opponent controls to their hand. You can banish 1 monster from your GY (Quick Effect); banish this card until the next End Phase. You can only activate each effect of "Seatus, Etherym of Return" once per turn.
